features: 📺 𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝟏𝟎𝟖𝟎𝐩 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥: The Supersonic HDTV delivers a crisp 1080p picture quality, bringing out every detail and contrast in your favorite content. Experience vibrant colors that span the spectrum, making your viewing experience truly captivating.

📺 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲: With HDMI, USB, and AC ports, this TV offers seamless connectivity to your devices. Whether it's streaming from your Firestick, gaming on your console, or using it as a computer monitor, the Supersonic HDTV has you covered.

📺 𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Compatible with Amazon Firestick and popular gaming consoles, this TV is your ultimate entertainment hub. Dive into your favorite games or access streaming apps like Netflix, Hulu, and HBO with ease.

📺 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐨 𝐚 𝐏𝐂 𝐌𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐨𝐫: Connect your PC via HDMI and transform your Supersonic HDTV into a brilliant computer monitor. Enjoy the perfect screen size and resolution for a fantastic PC experience.

📺 𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧, 𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐏𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐞: Get the best of both worlds with this affordable big-screen TV. Whether you need a kitchen TV, a portable TV, or just a compact solution, the Supersonic HDTV offers quality and value for all your entertainment needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For over 30 years, Supersonic is a manufacturer in Consumer and Mobile Electronics. Success has been derived from our core mission statement: To provide Design, Value and Quality products, which ensure years of ultimate entertainment experience for our consumers. We strive to offer innovative and quality products that fit into every individual lifestyle. With collaboration from our partners, suppliers and customers, Supersonic is continuously making an effort to satisfy the consumer’s current electronic needs.

SuperSonic LED Widescreen HDTV SERIES Enjoy stunning picture quality and feel like your right in the middle of the action with this LED HDTV. SuperSonic HDTV brings you a crisp 1080p picture quality for stunning detail and contrast. The colors projected from the monitor contains a spectrum of vibrant colors. Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk. It is also the perfect size for any RV owner! Our TVs contain HDMI, USB, and AC/DC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more. SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system. With PC inputs our TV's allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience!
What's in the Box: Remote ControlAC Power AdapterUser Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small TV for the breakfast nook. This one did not dissappoint. Nice construction, great picture, works well with Fire TV the sound is what I expected. The TV speakers are very small and the sound comes out of the bottom of the TV. The sound quality is tinny not much bass but, I expected this when I bought the TV. The remote control only works with the TV and the Fire remote does not work for TV controls. Overall I am very please with this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for my small space
reviews.reviewText: This is not a high quality television. Period. However, it works for the small space on my kitchen counter. I would have to agree with so many of the reviews that describe the sound as "tinny" yet at the same time, it IS audible and I can live with it. I would agree with yet another review that described the picture as sharp with good color rendition WHEN LOOKING STRAIGHT ON. The picture quality changes depending on one's viewing angle. It will lighten/wash out OR darken as I walk around the kitchen doing tasks. If I stay in one general area and adjust the screen appropriately, it is just fine. A small inconvenience to me is that I am not able to press/hold the up or down arrows on the remote to adjust the volume. Instead, I have to repeatedly click the arrow as it adjusts one digit at a time. I prefer holding the button down while the volume increases or decreases automatically (and much more quickly). Again, something I can live with but certainly not what I'm used to with other remote controls. Bottom line, I will use this television until I find something better. (I am not actively looking.) But for the reasonable price, it will be pretty easy to replace one day without feeling guilty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Let's get real: It is a fine little TV
reviews.reviewText: This is a fine little TV. Five stars for the quality of the TV, recognizing it for what it is (and not expecting it to compete with larger and more expensive sets). I got the black model, for a small TV near my work desk in my study. The unit is attractive, clean, and it fits in nicely in my decor. Picture quality is excellent, sound is great. It is true (as some reviewers have said) that picture quality falls off as you move away from center in front of the screen; that is normal and to be expected with any LED TV this size and at this price point. The picture is still clear and easy to view from normal viewing angles in front of the TV. It is also true that the speakers are small and attached to a small TV, so you're not going to get huge volume, depth of sound field, or base response. Sound fidelity is still great and the volume is plenty if you are sitting at a distance where you can reasonably see the screen. (I sit three to five feet from the screen, within about a five foot square area roughly but not always exactly in front of it.) Sound does tend to get tinny if you turn it all the way up. (I tried, just to test it; the volume gets very loud but sound quality quickly falls off if you get it near top volume. Sitting at four~ish feet away, I find that mine is normally less than 1/4 of full volume.) After just a few days, I've not yet seen any bad pixels or had to attempt support, so I can't comment yet on those aspects or on how long or well it will last. So, in sum: This great little unit is only 13.3 inches and costs less than $100. So let's get real: This is a great TV in this class and at this price point. This is NOT your living room home entertainment system; it is a small and inexpensive TV for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst sound quality imaginable.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1) Very light weight. Nice weight for mounting in an RV.2) Nice picture. It's very clear and adequately bright.3) AC/DC and functions on12V DC in the RV after you buy a DC cord.Cons:1) The worst sound quality I have ever experienced. My cell phone speaker is much louder. If your RV has the A/C running, or the microwave running, or there are kids playing outside of your RV, or it's raining, you will not be able to hear your TV, even at 100% volume. My hearing is stellar. This TVs audio is shockingly poor. This is truly the quietest TV I have ever seen. It's maybe 1/10th as loud as all other TVs I own.2) The DC cord is not included and must be purchased separately. AC/DC but no DC cord included?3) The AC cord is hardwired. AC/DC but the electrical AC/DC inputs are separate locations on the TV. The AC cord cannot be removed, so must be coiled up and stored behind the TV if running on DC.4) Leg mounting screws are included, but wall mounting screws are not included. 4 M4x10 if memory serves. $10.00 in gas and a trip to the hardware store for 4 mounting screws. (leg mounting screws and wall mounting screws should be the same as you are either mounting on the legs or mounting on a Wall. I guess my thinking is too simple)I'm disappointed and would not recommend this TV. It can run on 12V DC but was primarily designed to run on 120 AC. The poor audio is truly it's downfall. If I keep it, I'll have to run wires to the RV stereo for sound.
Easy to mount on wall and great size for small RV
The picture quality, sounds are fantastic and the best part HDMI connected video movies pictures mindblowing...
pour télé dans un motorisé parfait en 12 volt

reviews.reviewTitle: Great picture, great sound... maybe buy a second one?
reviews.reviewText: Great picture, great sound, great price. I did not expect it to be this good because my previous 13'' TV does not even come close to this quality. However, the reviews were great and it convinced me to give it a try. I have no regret, such a sharp picture, it's great.I am now seriously considering buying a larger TV with DVD reader combo from this company.
I really liked the matte screen. We were able to watch tv outside without much difficulty. I also like the AC/DC feature. Works great for our trailer.
